semanticschemas-desc: Manages Categories and Properties as an ontology backbone with schema management and automatic artifact generation
semanticschemas-overview-summary: Summary of categories and properties in the wiki
semanticschemas-overview-hero-descriptio: High-level snapshot of schema health, coverage, and recent activity.
semanticschemas-overview-quick-actions-s: Jump into the most common workflows.
semanticschemas-overview-categories-subt: Track coverage across templates, forms, and displays.
semanticschemas-overview-no-categories: No categories found yet. Import or generate to get started.
semanticschemas-export-description: Export the current ontology schema to JSON or YAML format
semanticschemas-import-description: Import a schema from file or text
semanticschemas-import-posthint-generate: Next step: go to Generate to create templates/forms.
semanticschemas-import-no-schema: No schema provided. Please upload a file or paste schema text.
semanticschemas-ratelimit-exceeded: Rate limit exceeded. You can perform up to $1 operations per hour. Please try again later.
semanticschemas-validate-description: Validate the current wiki schema for consistency
semanticschemas-generate-tip: Run Validate first to spot manual tweaks before regenerating.
semanticschemas-generate-success: Successfully generated artifacts for $1 of $2 categories.
semanticschemas-generate-category-error: Failed to generate artifacts for category '$1': $2
semanticschemas-diff-description: Compare a schema file with the current wiki state
semanticschemas-error-no-smw: SemanticMediaWiki is required but not installed
semanticschemas-error-no-pageforms: PageForms is required but not installed
semanticschemas-permission-denied: You do not have permission to perform this action
semanticschemas-status-in-sync: Schema and Wiki are in sync.
semanticschemas-status-out-of-sync: Out of sync. Generate artifacts to resolve.
semanticschemas-status-schema-changed: Schema file has changed since last import
semanticschemas-log-header: This log tracks SemanticSchemas operations (import, export, generate)
semanticschemas-api-param-category: Category name to retrieve hierarchy for (with or without 'Category:' prefix)
semanticschemas-api-param-parents: Optional: Parent categories for virtual hierarchy preview (for form preview mode). Pipe-separated list.
apihelp-semanticschemas-hierarchy-exampl: Get hierarchy for GraduateStudent category (with prefix)
Get virtual hierarchy preview with specified parents
semanticschemas-form-generated: Form for category "$1" has been generated.
semanticschemas-generate-form-failed: Failed to generate form for category "$1": $2
semanticschemas-generate-form-no-schema: Category "$1" does not have schema data. Import a schema first.
semanticschemas-install-config-subtitle: Set up the foundational schema pages
semanticschemas-install-config-descripti: This will install the base Category, Property, and Subobject pages required by SemanticSchemas. These pages define the core meta-schema used to describe your wiki's ontology.
semanticschemas-install-config-banner-me: The SemanticSchemas base configuration has not been installed. Install the base configuration to enable full functionality.
